name: Iphone 13
description:
The iPhone 13 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with vibrant colors, HDR support, and up to 1200 nits peak brightness. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip with 4 GB of RAM, it offers fast performance and efficient power use. Storage options range from 128 GB to 512 GB.
It has a dual-camera system with 12 MP wide and ultra-wide lenses, Cinematic Mode for videos, and improved low-light photography. The front 12 MP TrueDepth camera supports Face ID. Battery life is up to 2.5 hours longer than iPhone 12, with fast charging to 50% in ~30 minutes.
The design includes Ceramic Shield glass, aluminum frame, IP68 water resistance, and diagonal rear camera layout. It supports 5G, ships with iOS 15, and is available in Pink, Blue, Starlight, Midnight, and Green.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description:
The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10+ support, and Gorilla Glass Victus protection. It is powered by the Exynos 2100 (International) or Snapdragon 888 (USA) chipset, with options for 8GB of RAM and storage variants of 128GB or 256GB.
The camera system includes a triple-lens setup with a 12 MP ultra-wide, 12 MP wide, and 64 MP telephoto lens, capable of 8K video recording. The front camera is 10 MP and supports 4K video.
Battery life is supported by a 4000mAh battery with fast charging, wireless charging, and reverse wireless charging capabilities. The design features an aluminum frame, IP68 water resistance, and is available in Phantom Gray, Phantom White, Phantom Violet, and Phantom Pink.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
description:
The Xiaomi Mi 11 features a 6.81-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10+ support, and Gorilla Glass Victus protection. It is powered by the Snapdragon 888 chipset, with options for 8GB or 12GB of RAM and storage variants of 128GB or 256GB.
The camera system includes a triple-lens setup with a 108 MP wide, 13 MP ultra-wide, and 5 MP telephoto lens, capable of 8K video recording. The front camera is 20 MP and supports 4K video.
Battery life is supported by a 4600mAh battery with fast charging, wireless charging, and reverse wireless charging capabilities. The design features an aluminum frame, IP68 water resistance, and is available in Horizon Blue, Midnight Gray, and Frosted White.

name: Lenovo Ideapad 330s 14IKB
description:
The Lenovo Ideapad 330s 14IKB is a sleek and lightweight laptop featuring a 14-inch Full HD display with narrow bezels for an immersive viewing experience. It is powered by Intel's 8th generation processors, with options for i5 or i7, and comes with up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB SSD storage.
The laptop includes a backlit keyboard, a precision touchpad, and a fingerprint reader for added security. It offers a variety of ports, including USB-C, USB 3.0, HDMI, and a card reader. The Ideapad 330s is designed for portability and performance, making it suitable for both work and entertainment.

name: Lenovo Ideapad 330s 15IKB
description:
The Lenovo Ideapad 330s 15IKB is a versatile laptop featuring a 15.6-inch Full HD display with narrow bezels for an immersive viewing experience. It is powered by Intel's 8th generation processors, with options for i5 or i7, and comes with up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB SSD storage.
The laptop includes a backlit keyboard, a precision touchpad, and a fingerprint reader for added security. It offers a variety of ports, including USB-C, USB 3.0, HDMI, and a card reader. The Ideapad 330s is designed for portability and performance, making it suitable for both work and entertainment.

name: Dell Inspiron 15 3000
description:
The Dell Inspiron 15 3000 is a budget-friendly laptop featuring a 15.6-inch HD display with anti-glare technology. It is powered by Intel's 10th generation processors, with options for i3, i5, or i7, and comes with up to 8GB of RAM and 512GB SSD storage.
The laptop includes a full-size keyboard, a precision touchpad, and a variety of ports, including USB-C, USB 3.0, HDMI, and an SD card reader. The Inspiron 15 3000 is designed for everyday tasks, making it suitable for students and professionals alike.
